contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Paris metro |Name=Pernety |Pic=[[File:Point de rendez-vous.jpg|275px]] |Day=21 January |Year=1937 |Access=Rue Raymond-Losserand |Municipality=the 14th arrondissement of Paris |Zone=1 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next|13|Gaîté|Plaisance }} | X=111 | Y=123 }} '''Pernety''' is a station on line [[Paris Métro Line 13|Line 13]] of the [[Paris Métro]] in the [[14th arrondissement of Paris|14th arrondissement]]. The station opened on 21 January 1937 as part of the original line 14 between [[Montparnasse - Bienvenüe (Paris Métro)|Bienvenüe]] and [[Porte de Vanves (Paris Métro)|Porte de Vanves]]. This line became part of line 13 on 9 November 1976. The station is named after the ''Rue Pernety'', named after the [[Joseph Marie de Pernety]] (1766–1856), who was one of [[Napoleon]]'s generals and owned the land where the street was built. ==Layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;" colspan=2|<center><small>[[Side Platform]] |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|[[File:Metro-M.svg|20px]] [[File:Paris m 13 jms.svg|20px]] towards [[Châtillon - Montrouge (Paris Métro)|Châtillon - Montrouge]] |- |[[File:Metro-M.svg|20px]] [[File:Paris m 13 jms.svg|20px]] towards [[Asnières – Gennevilliers – Les Courtilles (Paris Métro)|Asnières – Gennevilliers – Les Courtilles]] or [[Saint-Denis - Université (Paris Métro)|Saint-Denis - Université]] |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" colspan=2|<center><small>[[Side Platform]] |} ==Gallery== <gallery widths="200px" heights="125px" perrow="2"> File:Pernety station.jpg|[[Paris Métro Line 13|Line 13]] platforms at Pernety </gallery> {{commons category|Pernety (Paris Metro)}} ==References== *Roland, Gérard (2003).
